desc-item1-content1: 1. Once you receive your Mulebuy parcel, please share your unboxing experience on social media,with preference given to video sharing.
desc-item1-content2: 2. Submit the sharing link on the Mulebuy Apply Reward Page and click the Submit Application button. Please ensure that the link is redirected to the content page of your Mulebuy shopping experience on social media.
desc-item1-content3: 3. Mulebuy manually verifies each review and issues the rewards accordingly.
desc-item2-title: Why do Mulebuy offer rewards for social media sharing?
desc-item2-content: We believe sharing your cross-border shopping experiences offers valuable insights for those yet to try it. We also welcome constructive feedback to help us improve our services.
desc-item3-content: We evaluate content based on usefulness and social media reach. You can submit your best performing links for review. Each submission is manually reviewed.
desc-item4-title: What are the rewards for sharing?
desc-item4-content1: You can get up to 100% of the parcel value as a cash reward for your contributions.
desc-item4-content2: We value every piece of your feedback, whether it is a good comment or a suggestion, it will help us improve the quality of our service. It is worth mentioning that as long as your posts or videos continue to exist and remain popular, they will continue to bring you income! For the videos or posts you publish, you can also leave a message in the comment area and add your exclusive affiliate link, so that the video can continue to help you earn commissions!
desc-item4-content3: Final reminder: Please share the videos or posts you created. The videos or posts you share must be creative content published within one month! Please avoid sharing the same content repeatedly!
apply-config-reddit-tips1: Click the link below to share your experience on MuleBuy
apply-config-reddit-tips2: We will begin verifying your sharing link after 72 hours. If approved, you will receive your reward within a maximum of 96 hours after applying.
apply-config-reddit-tips4: in the comment box of the post and ensure that the sharing link is valid. Otherwise, the reward distribution may be affected. Thank you for sharing!
apply-config-reddit-tips5: If you have any questions regarding the reward, please contact us at

apply-config-tiktok-tips4: Please ensure that the submitted link is valid and keep an eye on your Mulebuy message box. Thank you for sharing!
apply-config-tiktok-tips5: If you have any questions regarding the reward, please contact us at

apply-config-trustpilot-tips1: Click the link below to share your experience on Mulebuy
apply-config-trustpilot-tips2: Thank you for supporting Mulebuy! We invite you to share your service experience on Trustpilot.
apply-config-trustpilot-tips3: To ensure your privacy, please avoid mentioning any specific product information in your review; focus instead on your overall experience.Ensure the link you submit is valid and keep an eye on your Mulebuy message box for verification results.
apply-config-trustpilot-tips4: If you have any questions or need more information about the rewards, please contact us at
